context: What is the difference between the DSS2 and the DSS1?
response: Both products process Dolby Digital 5.1/7.1 surround-sound audio through a digital optical connection. The original DSS has variable bass boost. The DSS2 replaces the variable bass boost with a fixed (on/off) bass boost, adjustable surround-sound angle presets, and includes an auxiliary analog audio input in additional to the main analog audio input.

context: Does this work on American Windows 7?
response: Yes, it does. I installed it on my laptop which runs windows 7 and it works fine. Also if it doesn't for some reason I think you can have the game run under a older operating system emulator on your computer by right clicking the game desktop icon/as a reinstall option. Hope this helps it's a very fun game.
